messages.content: What is the process to install ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
To install ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts, clone the repository to your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory using the command `git clone https://github.com/pythongosssss/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts.git`.
How can I uninstall ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
For uninstallation, delete the cloned repo from your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory and ensure `web/extensions/pysssss/CustomScripts` has also been removed.
What are the steps to update ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
To update ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts, navigate to the cloned repo and pull the latest changes using the commands `cd custom_nodes/ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts` and `git pull`.
What features are included in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?

Features include Autocomplete, Auto Arrange Graph, Always Snap to Grid, Better Loader Lists (with custom Lora and Checkpoint loader nodes), Checkpoint/LoRA/Embedding Info, Constrain Image, Custom Colors, Favicon Status, Image Feed, KSampler (Advanced) denoiser helper, Lock Nodes & Groups, Math Expression, Node Finder, Preset Text, Quick Nodes, Play Sound, [WIP] Repeater, Show Text, Show Image on Menu, String Function, Touch Support, Widget Defaults, Workflows, and Workflow Images.
How can I import or export the graph as SVG and PNG showing a view of the nodes?
Use the menu options for importing/exporting the graph as SVG and PNG, provided in the Workflows section of ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts.
What is the purpose of the Reroute Primitive in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
The Reroute Primitive provides a node that allows rerouting primitives. It can also be collapsed to a single point that you can drag around.
What does the Show Text node in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts do?
The Show Text node takes input from a node that produces a string and displays it, useful for things like interrogator, prompt generators, etc.
Can I prevent moving nodes in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts until they are unlocked?
Yes, you can add a lock option to nodes & groups that prevents you from moving them until unlocked.
What does the Autocomplete feature in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts provide?
The Autocomplete feature provides embedding and custom word autocomplete. You can view embedding details by clicking on the info icon on the list.
What types of values can be input in the Math Expression node?
The Math Expression node supports input values of INT, FLOAT, IMAGE, and LATENT.
What does the String Function node in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts do?
The String Function node supports appending and replacing text. It also supports tidying tags and replacing text using regex.
What does the Better Loader Lists feature in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts add?
The Better Loader Lists feature adds custom LoRA and Checkpoint loader nodes, which have the ability to show preview images.
Where can I find the changes made to the ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts?
You can find the changes made in the Changelog section of the ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts GitHub repository.
